response.overview: Zahi Hawass, secretary general of the Supreme Council of Egyptian Antiquities, has selected for Discovery Channel the 10 most important discoveries that rewrote the history of the pharaohs.  Thanks to modern scientific analysis techniques, the images guide the viewer beyond the archaeological find, to discover the most hidden secrets of life and thought in Ancient Egypt, and, thanks to the most recent research, they paint an extraordinary picture of its civilization and of its treasures.
response.title: Antico Egitto. Le grandi scoperte
